        <name>Deactivate Agent Whisper</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Deactivate Agent Whisper if running on an upgraded instance
if (GlidePluginManager.isUpgradeSystemBusy()) {
    var helpRequestedGR_qa = new GlideRecord('quickactions_action');
    if (helpRequestedGR_qa.get('234bd259b7ae00108766db98ee11a92a')) {
        helpRequestedGR_qa.setValue('active', false);
        helpRequestedGR_qa.setWorkflow(false);
		helpRequestedGR_qa.autoSysFields(false);
        helpRequestedGR_qa.update();
	}
} else {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_live_agent_setup");
	if (gr.get('f0acbc4c5f091300e6333654de7313c8')) { // Default chat setup sys_id
		gr.setValue('agent_whisper', true);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.autoSysFields(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
